data.name: XamComboEditor_Properties
data.value: XamCombo Properties

data.name: XamComboEditor_IsDropDownOpen_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selectable drop-down is open.

data.name: XamComboEditor_ItemContainerStyle_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the style that will be applied to all Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ComboEditorItemControl's in the dropdown of this combo.

data.name: XamComboEditor_MaxDropDownHeight_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets the maximum height the dropdown of this Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamComboEditor can be.

data.name: XamComboEditor_SelectedIndex_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets the index of the selected item in this Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamComboEditor.

data.name: XamComboEditor_SelectedItem_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets the selected data item of this Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamComboEditorNote: the item will be of your data model, not of type Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ComboEditorItem

data.name: XamComboEditor_SelectedItems_Property
data.value: Gets the currently selected items.

data.name: XamComboEditor_CustomItemsFilter_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ItemsFilter that should be applied when AllowFiltering is turned on. Note: when not set, this will default to a StartsWith filter.

data.name: XamComboEditor_IsEditable_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets whether the XamComboEditor should allow the end user to be able to type into the combo, for selection. Note: this should be set to true, for AllowFilter and AutoComplete to work.

data.name: XamComboEditor_ItemTemplate_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets the DataTemplate that should be applied to each Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ComboEditorItem in the dropdown.

data.name: XamComboEditor_ItemsSource_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a collection used to generate the content of each item.

data.name: XamComboEditor_DisplayMemberPath_Property
data.value: Gets or sets a path to a value on the source object to serve as the visual representation of the object.

data.name: XamComboEditor_AutoComplete_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets whether or not the combo should look through the data source while the user is typing, and hilight the rest of the text that matches with what they are currently typing.

data.name: XamComboEditor_Items_Property
data.value: Gets the collection used to generate the content of the control.

data.name: XamComboEditor_AllowMultipleSelection_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets whether the end user should be allowed to select multiple items at the same time.

data.name: XamComboEditor_CheckBoxVisibility_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets whether checkboxes should be displayed in the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ComboEditorItemControl's dropdown.

data.name: XamComboEditor_MultiSelectValueDelimiter_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets the char that should be used break up the SelectedItems in the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamComboEditorThis is only appleid when AllowMultipleSelection is true.

data.name: XamComboEditor_AutoCompleteDelay_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum delay, in milliseconds, after text is typed in the text box before the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.XamComboEditor control populates the list of possible matches in the drop-down.

data.name: XamComboEditor_CustomValueEnteredAction_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets what action should occur when entering data into the combo editor that doesn't exist in the underlying ItemsSource.

data.name: XamComboEditor_OpenDropDownOnTyping_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets whether the DropDown will open when the user starts typing.

data.name: XamComboEditor_EmptyText_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets the Text that should be displayed when the editor doesn't have anything selected.

data.value: Infragistics

data.value: Infragistics/Control Parts/XamComboEditor

data.value: Gets/sets a value that determines in which direction(s) the control's content can be resized.

data.value: Gets/sets the Style that will be applied to every System.Windows.Controls.Image in this Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ImageComboColumn.

data.name: ImageComboColumn_ImageHeight_Property
data.value: Gets / sets a height to all images in an Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ImageComboColumn

data.name: ImageComboColumn_ImageWidth_Property
data.value: Gets / sets a width to all images in an Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ImageComboColumn

data.name: ComboRowBase_ActualHeight_Property

data.name: ComboColumn_Visibility_Property
data.value: Gets/Sets the Visibility of the Infragistics.Controls.Editors.ComboColumn

data.name: ComboCellsPanel_Owner_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the MultiColumnComboItemsPanel that owns this control.

data.name: ComboColumnCollection_FillerColumn_Property
data.value: Gets the column that is used to fill up empty space in a row.

data.name: ComboRowBase_IsMouseOver_Property
data.value: Gets whether the mouse is currently over the row.

data.name: MultiColumnComboEditorCommandSource_CommandType_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the MultiColumnComboEditorCommand which is to be executed by the command.

data.name: XamMultiColumnComboEditor_LocalizedStrings_Property
data.value: Returns a dictionary of localized strings for use by the control in its template.

data.name: XamMultiColumnComboEditor_SelectedItemsResetButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether a button is displayed in the control's UI that lets the end user reset the list of currently selected items.

data.name: XamMultiColumnComboEditorAssetLibrary

data.name: ComboCellsPanelAutomationPeer_Value_Property

data.name: ComboCellsPanelAutomationPeer_IsSelected_Property
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether an item is selected.

data.name: ComboCellsPanelAutomationPeer_SelectionContainer_Property
data.value: Gets the UI automation provider that implements System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider and acts as the container for the calling object.

data.name: ComboEditorBase`2_EditAreaBackground_Property
data.value: Controls the color that will be applied to the text area when the control is editable.
